CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Conflicts"), "Intapp Open - Conflicts", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Intake"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Intapp Flow"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Terms of Business"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Contract Express") ), "Intapp Open - Intake", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Integration Builder"), "Integration Builder", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "LegalKey"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Compliguard Analyze"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Compliguard Flow"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Compliguard Protect") ), "TFG - Other", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "DTE"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "DTE Axiom"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Intapp Time"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Time Builder"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "RollCall") ), "Intapp Time", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Rekoop"), "Intapp Time - Cloud", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Wall Builder"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Activity Tracker") ), "Wall Builder", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "gES"), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "gES â€“ Outlook") ), "gES", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "IIS"), "Integration Service - Cloud", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Pricing"), "Pricing - Cloud", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Sisense"), "Placeholder", "Error" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Product Line
